Html:
Hi, what is the corresponding method OnRender of class GMapMarker in WPF dll?

I have used this method with WindowsForm dll to create a custom marker and now for another project in WPF i would reuse my custom marker.

Regards
in wpf, marker is any UIElement, there is no custom rendering
OK, so I have to rewrite the class. The Circle class in the demo can be viewed as an ellipse or semi-circle ?
